title: Finding Directions
description: Practice asking for and giving directions in a foreign city

steps.name: initial greeting
steps.instruction: Greet the person who approaches you and ask if they need help.
steps.completion_criteria: The person responds to your greeting and indicates they need directions.

steps.name: understanding destination
steps.instruction: Listen to where the person wants to go and confirm you understand the location.
steps.completion_criteria: You correctly identify and acknowledge the destination the person is looking for.

steps.name: giving directions
steps.instruction: Provide clear, step-by-step directions to the destination, including landmarks and distances.
steps.completion_criteria: You have given complete directions and the person acknowledges they understand.

steps.name: clarification
steps.instruction: Answer any follow-up questions about the route and offer additional help if needed.
steps.completion_criteria: The person confirms they have all the information they need.

steps.name: ending
steps.instruction: End the conversation politely with a friendly farewell.
steps.completion_criteria: Both parties exchange goodbyes and the conversation concludes naturally.
